name: .VTEX_C File Extension
summary: Learn about .VTEX_C files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use the Valve Source 2 Viewer (Windows) to decompile a VTEX_C file into an image file. Then, you can open the image in any image-viewing or -editing application that supports that file format. For example, if your VTEX_C file is a compiled TGA file, you can open the resulting TGA file in GIMP (cross-platform) or Adobe Photoshop (Windows, Mac).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
